name: ancient-brass-dragon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a detailed concept art in an Illustration style, showcasing a heroic tabletop fantasy, reminiscent of medieval-fantasy materials. Depict a stylized brass dragon with highlighted musculature and unique limbs set against a human silhouette, employing an underwater-sky merged zone to portray motion. Ground the image in aquatic fantasy realism, with subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents for detail. Incorporate materials reminiscent of pressure-domes, but avoiding any signs of modern technology. Use a selective three-color palette consisting of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens with pearl highlights. Prioritize a painterly collection style, consistent across the art piece to create cultural coherence in gear and elements. Do not include any modern signage, anime style, bloom glare, or photoreal CGI. Make sure to keep any symbols meaningful and avoid any artworks, text, or words unless specified.
